Had an issue missing Telegram notifications while running full-screen games in Linux. Fixed by disabling Settings ‚Üí Notifications and Sounds ‚Üí Use native notifications. I thought enabling it would be cool, but KDE and Electron apparently don‚Äôt get along that well.

Dabbling with different ways to manage the source notes for My Public Brain. Obsidian works, but I would like a better way to express subtopic relations. Sure there‚Äôs Obsidian Breadcrumbs. For what I‚Äôm thinking of, I prefer something like Dendron where you don‚Äôt have to dig into frontmatter, properties, or recursive folder listings to understand note relationships.

Also chewing on how to do an RSS feed for the cards. Can‚Äôt just use created property. I might let a note sit in the private Inbox for a while before I decide it‚Äôs ready to be a public Card. The site front page uses a naive interpretation of updated to show recently changed cards. Not sure the same logic would make sense for a chronological feed. Maybe something that asks Git when a file showed up in cards/?

Anyways, not important right now. Need more of my brain for job hunting and studying.
